passages.text:
(Eon waits at the train station.) 
There is noone but Eon at the station. 
It is chilly, gloomy and dark.
[[Ox| Intro 2 (Ox)]]
passages.name: Intro (Ox)

passages.text:
She looks towards where the sound is approaching.
A silhouette approaching her.
She turns her head away. Stranger doesn't stop.
Footsteps coming closer.
[[Stranger2]]
passages.name: Stranger

passages.text:
She looks again towards the stranger. 
They are wearing a dark jacket, jeans and sneakers. face still in shadows.
Casual she thinks.
Stranger keeps walking towards her.
She looks away.
[[Hello stranger]]
passages.name: Stranger2
Hello stranger

passages.text:
Eon: Hello? Can I help you?
Stranger: You can help yourself
// Replies the stranger, with a big alligator smile on his face.
[[Eagle | Eagle Convo 1]]
[[Ox |Ox Hello]]
passages.name: Eagle Hello

passages.text:
Eon: uhmmm...
[[Ox|Ox Convo 1]]
passages.name: Ox Hello
Ox Convo 1

passages.text:
//The stranger is suddenly at the exit door. 
Stranger: I told you not to be scared.
[[Ox|Ox Run]]
[[Lion|Lion Convo 1]]
passages.name: Ox Exit Door

passages.text:
Eon: Ah!
[[Ox|Ox Exit Door]]
passages.name: Ox Run

passages.text:
Eon: Just fucking let me go!
Stranger: If I were you, I'd listen to me. Or there would be consequences.
[[Ox|Ox Run]]
[[Lion|Lion Convo 2]]
passages.name: Lion Convo 1

passages.text:
Eon gets chills. She doesn't like being alone.
I wish there was someone waiting with me.
Then she hears footsteps.
[[Stranger]]
passages.name: Intro 2 (Ox)

passages.text:
Eon: What the fuck you want?
Stranger: I have a riddle for you.
Eon: What?
Stranger: A riddle
[[Human|Human What's a riddle]]
[[Ox|Ox Ask the riddle]]
passages.name: Lion Convo 2

passages.text:
Eon: I don't know what riddle means
Stranger: Are you from fucking Mars? How do you not know what riddles are?
Eon: I just don't man. Sorry.
Stranger: Oh man...
Stranger: Okay, I'll just explain then. It's like a puzzle you solve.
[[Human|Human What's a puzzle]]
[[Ox|Ox Run]]
passages.name: Human What's a riddle

passages.text:
Eon: Okay, tell me.
// The Alligator smile grows bigger.
Stranger: Okay here it comes...
[[Ox |Riddle asked]]
passages.name: Ox Ask the riddle

passages.text:
Eon: Okay but what's a puzzle?
Stranger: What?
Eon: I don't know what that means.
Stranger: Are you fucking kidding me?
Eon: Why would I do that?
Stranger: I'll tell you something and you'll try to guess what I mean!
Eon: Oh okay, it's a guessing game. But...
Stranger: QUIET NOW!
[[Human |Riddle asked]]
passages.name: Human What's a puzzle

passages.text:
Stranger: Yes it is. So here it comes... 
Stranger: What is something that you get to keep after you give it to someone? Take you time because if you fail, there will be consequences.
[[Human | Human thinks]]
[[Ox | Ox thinks]]
[[Eagle | Eagle Thinks]]
passages.name: Riddle asked

passages.text: Eon: Hmm, It can be multiple things [[Ox | Ox Riddle 1]] [[ Human | Human Riddle 1]]
passages.name: Human thinks

passages.text:
Wait a minute! That's just cheating man, not cool. It is my turn to ask you one now!
(text-colour: "red")[You?] Stranger looks suspicious.
Yes, it's your turn to guess now.
[[Human | Human asks riddle]]
[[Eagle | Eagle guess queen]]
passages.name: Human Guess 2

passages.text: Eon: Queen
passages.name: Eagle guess queen

passages.text: Eon: What is something that you get to keep after giving it?... Eon: I'm sorry, do you mind repeating the riddle again? [[Ox | Ox Riddle 2]]
passages.name: Ox Riddle 1

passages.text: Eon: Water
passages.name: Eagle Answer water

passages.text: Stranges: What is something that you get to keep after you give it to someone? Eon: Yes yes...I just need to think a little. Eon: It sounds like, hmm, love probably. You gotta have love to be able to give it someone. The more you give, the more you have? I mean, that's what they say... [[Ox | Ox Answer Love 1]] [[Human | Human Riddle 1]]
passages.name: Ox Riddle 2

passages.text: Eon: But what if it is not? There will be consequences he said. //She looks at the stranger. He is playing with his phone. He looks //impatient tapping on the floor with this foot. Eon: What can the consequence be? I guess something bad. Eon: It looks like he is just checking his messages.He looks like a normal person. Hmm. But this is definitely not a normal situation or act... Stranger: Ehem! You still there? It's getting late" Eon: Yes, just one more minute. [[Ox | Ox Answer Love 2]] [[Eagle | Eagle Answer Water 1]]
passages.name: Ox Answer Love 1

passages.text: Eon: It has to be love, she thinks, or at least nothing else comes to mind. Eon: Okay, I'd guess it's love. [[Ox | Ox Answer Love 3]]
passages.name: Ox Answer Love 2

passages.text: Eon: Water
passages.name: Eagle Answer Water 1

passages.text: Eon: What kind of consequences she asks with a whisper. Eon: It is useless to discuss it at this point. Just think. [[Ox | Ox Riddle 1]] [[Eagle | Eagle Answer water]]
passages.name: Ox thinks

passages.text:
Eon: What is it that given one, you'll have either two or none?
//Stranger looks extremly bitter. No more smile.
Eon: Think carefully. Remember, there will be consequences.
[[Human | Human Escape 1]]
passages.name: Human asks riddle
Human Escape 1
Human Escape 2

passages.text: Eon: Sounds like STD's fits this definition perfectly. You still keep them after you give it to someone. [[Human | Human Guess 1]] [[Ox | Ox Riddle 1]]
passages.name: Human Riddle 1

passages.text:
Eon: Okay, I think it's STD's.
Stranger: Ehmm...
Eon: What? You give them and still keep them.
Stranger: I guess that's true, but that was not the answer I expected. So, I'll ask another now.
[[Human | Human Guess 2]]
passages.name: Human Guess 1

passages.text:
Stranger: Oooh, aren't you a sweetheart...
Stranger: But that's not correct unfortunately.You can totally love and then open up to someone. And lose it afterwards because they are actually a piece of shit!
Eon: Argh, sounds like you have some shit going on.
Stranger: Anyway, you failed! You'll face the consequences.
//And the stranger disappears, boom!
[[Ox | Ox Announcement ]]
passages.name: Ox Answer Love 3

passages.text:
Eon: Holy shit, what's gonna happen now?
Then she hears speakers turned on. 
Stranger: TO GET OUT YOU GOTTA EAT THE EXIT WHOLE DOOR. DON'T TRY TO CHEAT, IT WON'T WORK.
Eon: The door?
[[Ox | Ox Turnip 1]]
[[Eagle | Eagle Turnip 1]]
passages.name: Ox Announcement
Ox Turnip 1

passages.text:
Okay, I can eat turnip. Whatever.
She bites the turnip.
It is hard, and bitter just like he said.
[[Ox]]
passages.name: Ox Turnip 2

passages.text:
This is really stupid, she thinks. I am not trying to get out. I'm waiting to get on my train!
I should just pretend to eat it until my train arrives, which can be any minute.
(text-colour: "red")[GO AHEAD] Stranger keeps talking.
[[Eagle | Eagle Turnip 2]]
passages.name: Eagle Turnip 1

passages.text:
Eon takes a very small bite of the turnip.
(text-colour: "red")[WOW YOU ARE A SLOW EATER]
Eon shouts: Wow I am so full, I think I need a break.
[[Eagle | Eagle Turnip 3]]
passages.name: Eagle Turnip 2

passages.text:
As she hears the train approaching, she gets back to eating again.
(text-colour: "red")[GOTTA EAT FASTER]
passages.name: Eagle Turnip 3

passages.text:
Eon: Why do you talk to me like that? What do you want?
Stranger: I have a riddle for you. I want you to make a guess. If you guess right, you'll be fine. If not, there will be consequences.
[[Eagle | Eagle Convo 2]]
[[Ox |Ox Hello]]
[[Human |Human What's a riddle]]
passages.name: Eagle Convo 1

passages.text:
Eon: What if I say no?
Stranger: Then you'll lose by default and face the consequences.
Eon: And what are those?
Stranger: I cannot tell, that's a surprise.
[[Ox |Ox Ask the riddle]]
[[Human |Human What's a riddle]]
[[Eagle |Eagle Convo 3]]
[[Lion |Lion Convo 2]]
passages.name: Eagle Convo 2

passages.text:
Eon: And may I ask who you are?
//Strangers smile grows deeper.
Stranger: I am the riddle master. I am ancient.
Eon: I think I know who you are.
Stranger: Is that so? Then tell me my name!
[[Eagle |Eagle Convo 4]]
passages.name: Eagle Convo 3

passages.text:
Eon: You are Syphinx, master of riddles and father of terror.
Stranger: I have to admit, no one called me by that in a very long time. You impressed me girl. 
Eon: And I guess you'll eat me if I guess incorrectly?
Stranger: No, not anymore. I developed reflux over the years. But I have other methods of terror. Anyway, as you know by now there is no other option for you to answer my riddle. Are you ready?
[[Eagle |Riddle asked]]
passages.name: Eagle Convo 4

passages.text:
Eon: Interesting... Multiple things come to mind.
[[Ox | Ox Riddle 1]]
[[ Human | Human Riddle 1]]
[[Eagle | Eagle Riddle 1]]
passages.name: Eagle Thinks

passages.text: Eon: This dude must be super old. It might be a lame word play. Eon: So it can be an advise or word. But technically you don't need to keep any of those after giving them. [[Human | Human Guess 1]] [[Ox | Ox Riddle 1]] [[Eagle |Eagle Guess 1]]
passages.name: Eagle Riddle 1

passages.text: Eon: I guess you are expected to keep your word after you give it. Eon: Considering this dude's age, it's probably something old fashioned like that. I'll go for it, at least I won't get eaten. Eon: My guess is "word"
passages.name: Eagle Guess 1

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.
passages.name: Ox

passages.text: Eon: Oh shit!
passages.name: Eagle
